fields.summary: Android: setSelection method on textField fires change event, and value is not changing
fields.environment:
Ti SDK 6.1.1.GA / 6.1.2.v20170727160839
Appcelerator CLI 6.2.2
Node 4.6.2
Android SDK Platform-tools 23.3

comments.body: Hi guys - is there any update on this? The only workaround we currently have for this would sacrifice usability and functionality, which is highly undesirable.

Hello [~plancaster] 
We have looked at this today and were able to reproduce. The change that triggers this behavior was a workaround for a google bug and was implemented 1 year ago. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22933803/edittexts-selectall-does-not-select-the-text-instead-cursor-is-moved-to-posi/35527348#35527348 for the description of the issue and https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blame/master/android/modules/ui/src/java/ti/modules/titanium/ui/widget/TiUIText.java#L683 for the section of the SDK where it was implemented. Basically it does a replace, which would fire the change event. At this point I don't have a good workaround for you, but as soon as I have a fix we can get you a build to try. 6.2.0 is our next build, scheduled for the end of this month. I will work with support to see what other options are available and will get  you that info through them. I will update this ticket should we find a workaround in the meantime. Expect an update early next week.

FR Passed for both branches.
PR merged.
